alert.note: Alert for Boone (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Boone County through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Primrose, or 14 miles west of Albion, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Primrose around 320 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
